replies.body: I like where this is going.
I don't know, he isn't in quite the level of eminent danger that Helmet Bro usually is.  If the dinosaurs were about to step on him then it would be certain, but I'm just not sure yet.
You might be right, Helmet Bro is usually in imminent danger of death like being disintegrated by {{champion:161}}

A place where a huge prehistoric crocodile with a massive weapon, a long armed tyrannosaurus which increases in size at each bite and a pterodactil with ice powers means imminent death no metter where their feets are.
Why do I feel the feathered hat man is Tabu, a character Riot didn't use.....he was supposed to be a voodoo shaman of sorts....

Tabu had a top hat of sorts.

He wasn't the... Islander-type voodoo-shaman, he was more of a...Princess and the Frog-type voodoo shaman.
that was then though, you can rework appearance and thematics haha
It could be a prehistoric Karthus
nono sir karthus' legs are not that muscled xD
lol, true enough. But it would make for an interesting skin
Nailed it. Must be the one on the right, though; Pretty sure Helmet Bro is a fighter, not a mage or support.
I wish chogath looked like that ingame
I'd like to know who those 2 are, if Riot has planned something with them that is.
woa....so whoes the big Dyno in the background?
